description:
ornate silver inlay on forearm, wooden part of barrel, neck and stock; images of faces with dragon in silver inlay on stock and trigger guard; tooling and engraving on steel parts; "Paul Mascon A. Paris" engraved in top of barrel. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Stump walnut, steel, iron, silver, gold
title: French Three-shot Flintlock Revolver
